channel.title: [PI] Eating & Drinking
channel.description: Whenever I eat something or drink a potion my client freezes and i get an error in the server cmd. [code][10-5-14 14:26]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3724 [10-5-14 14:26]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickItem.processPacket(ClickItem.java:17) [10-5-14 14:26]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:139) [10-5-14 14:26]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:1997) [10-5-14 14:26]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:147) [10-5-14 14:26]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:181)[/code]

item.title: [PI] Eating & Drinking
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

[quote=“Dan0194, post:8, topic:542965”][quote author=xX4m4zingXx link=topic=661841.msg4424829#msg4424829 date=1400350786]
so, what should i do now?
[/quote]

Change it with

[code=java5] public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndianA();
int itemSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
int itemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
if (itemId != c.playerItems[itemSlot] - 1) {
return;

                }[/code][/quote]

Ty, that worked.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Eating & Drinking
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Dan0194, post:10, topic:542965”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=661841.msg4424837#msg4424837 date=1400351999]
post your entire clickitem class
[/quote]
Guys it’s what I posted above he is reading the wrong value from his stream.[/quote]
^^^^^
Most PI’s use this:

		int junk = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndianA();
		int itemSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
		int itemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
		if (itemId != c.playerItems[itemSlot] - 1) {
			return;
		}

But what you said is literally the same (without the junk int declared)

Read full topic

[/quote]

is it this

[code]public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
int itemSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
int itemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
if (itemId != c.playerItems[itemSlot] - 1) {
return;

	}[/code]
